SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo, SUBJECT AS subject, CONTENTS AS contents, INSERT_ID AS insertId, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate FROM ( SELECT BOARDM.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS NUM FROM BOARDM WHERE DELETE_YN != 1) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT BOARD_NO AS BoardNo, SUBJECT AS subject, CONTENTS AS contents, INSERT_ID AS insertId, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate FROM BOARDM WHERE BOARD_NO = #{index} AND DELETE_YN != 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDM( BOARD_NO, SUBJECT, CONTENTS, DELETE_YN, INSERT_ID, MODIFY_ID, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES( BOARDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{contents}, '0', #{insertId}, #{insertId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
